root: ^Hello, is there something I can help you with?

Introduction: ^Yes, i'm looking for this girl, she was last seen in this area.
^What can you tell me about the area.
^Sorry to bother you, I'll be leaving now.
Inquire: ^No, I've never seen someone who fits that description, sorry officer.

s: ^Thank you for your co-operation, have a good day.

Locale: ^Well, there's not much here, the only place I can think of is the pub, "The Swansong" at the end of the road, other than that, most places are closed in this area of the city.

s: ^Thank you for your time, You've been very helpful
